markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Side by Side (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=529) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 175 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
an animal companion

</column>

---

You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them off balance. Whenever you and your animal companion are adjacent to the same foe, you are both flanking that foe with each other, regardless of your actual positions.
name: Side by Side (Ranger)
